value.name: Police dashcam shows deadly shooting of mentally ill man
value.description: Caught on tape: A dashcam video which purportedly shows the moments leading up to Miami Gardens police fatally shooting a mentally ill man has been made public. Lavall Hall, 25, was shot in February.
